chapter.title: Projects
chapter.para: In order to begin utilizing the Time and Expense features, you must create Projects to track time and expenses against. xTuple provides the ability to create basic Projects with links to Tasks and Project progress and budget review. In this chapter the following topics will be covered, as they relate to Time and Expense.
Once a Project is created, you can begin entering Time and Expense Sheets!

section.title: Create Project
section.para: The first thing that needs to get done before you can start entering time and expenses is to create a Project to associate these costs with. Keep in mind, you cannot create Time Sheets without a Project. To create a Project follow these steps:

listitem.para: Go to this path: CRM > Project > New...
Complete the Project information and refer to the xTuple ERP Reference Guide for further details regarding specific Project fields.

note.para: If you want the Project to appear on the Time Sheet, the Project status must be "In-Process."

section.title: Create Project Tasks
section.para: In order to track time and expenses against a Project, a Task will be required for Time Sheet entries. When selecting the Project "Tasks" tab, you will be presented with the following screen:
From the Task list, simply select the NEW button to create a new Task. You can then enter the Task description and other details on the following screen:
Under the "Billing" tab you can specify a Customer, billing rate, and an Item that will appear as default values on Time Sheets.
When you are done entering billing information, select the SAVE to close and exit the screen.

section.title: Project Reporting
section.para: As Project team members are entering time and expenses against a Project, there are a few different areas where the Project Manager can monitor and track this information on the Project itself. First open an existing Project by following these steps:

listitem.para: Go to this path: CRM > Project > List...
Select a Project and click the ACTIVITY button on the "Schedule" tab

section.para: The Project Activity report illustrates current Project activities associated with Sales Orders, Purchase Orders, Work Orders, and Invoices resulting from services billed out via Time and Expense.

Next select the "Summary" tab on the Project. This tab shows a summary of the time and expenses which have been recorded against the Project thus far. Time and Expenses can be entered via a Time Sheet or a Project Manager can manually enter this data on specific Tasks.
Finally, if you need a break down of time and expenses by Task, select the "Tasks" tab. You will again be presented with the following screen:
Click the PRINT button and you will be able to view a itemized list of Tasks that lists the status of each Task and the actual hours versus budgeted hours.
